definitions.body: city in Moab (MI:21, MI:28 [[דיבן]], cf. ib.:1 adj. gent. [[הדיבני]])—[[דִּיבׂן]] Nu 21:30, Nu 32:3, Nu 32:34 (built up or at by Gad) Is 15:2; in territory of Gad, hence [[דִּיבׂן גׇּדָ]] Nu 33:45, Nu 33:46 (cf. on these vv. & Nu 32:34 MI:10 f.); also [[דִּיבוֹן]] Jos 13:9, Jos 13:17, Je 48:22; [[ישֶׁבֶת בַּת דִּיבוֹן]] Je 48:18; = [[דִּימוֹן]] Is 15:9, vid. also [[מֵי דִימוֹן]] v:Is 15:9 = Arnon, cf. Che & Hpt:ZA 1887, 268;—mod. Dîbân, north of Arnon, cf. Seetzen:Reisen i. 409 Tristr:Land of Moab 132 ff. Bd:Pal 193.
[[דִּיבׂן]] Ne 11:25 place in Judah, toward south = [[דִּימוֹנׇה]] Jos 15:22, cf. Hpt:l.c.; conject. by Kn Ke (cf. Di) to be Tell ed Dheib (van de Velde:Mem. 252) called also Ehdeib (Rob:BR ii. 102).
